pasta: I watched the replay. Brood sits invis in midlane for just over 5 mins, leeching exp. All other 9 heroes sit in base. They all accumulate passive gold to the tune of about 1500 each. Then they abandon from inactivity, and all the gold goes to brood (she must buy items and then sell them?) Brood then gets a rapier and finishes.

Can I just say I fucking love what NAHAZ (sorry, my phone autocorrects his name to full caps) brings to the table? If he were your regular 25 year old commentator, he'd be bringing something unique already, but with his age, he brings an air of credibility to the whole scene. When my gf looks at the casting panel and sees NAHAZ, she can't look at dota as "just a game". Thanks for being you, NAHAZ, and for being true to your passions, despite the stigma.

I like really like PPD, hes probably my all time favorite person to watch at night with my tablet when im going to bed, usually get a pretty good laugh at him flaming someone (they always deserve it) and hes always very positive with his team. Hes my type of player, no bs and focused on what needs to get done, I just wish I had salt signed by him. Also is it true that when PPD was a baby his mom accidentally dropped him in a pile of salt at the salt mine his dad works at, and thats why hes been so salty ever since?

Did you know Silencer used to be a father? He dated Naga (yeah, he's into that kinda shit) for 2 years in high school and married her a few years after that. They eventually had a mer-baby. Naga worked all week at the opera house so Nortrom was a stay at home dad. He dealt with crying every day and one day last worded the poor thing. After 5 agonizing seconds, his head exploded and Nortrom ran away for good. They say he's still out there, Last-Wording noisy kids. And that, son, is why you shut the fuck up when Daddy's trying to enjoy his two hours of free time a week and have a god damn beer.

You know those atomic clocks used in space that are always 100% accurate? IceFrog does something similar; an atomic scale! Unfortunately, IceFrog accidentally used Lead instead of Cesium, which is why Sniper is fucking broken

Hi, I played against Sumail on a 7k account I bought. I'd get there myself, but i always queue with bad players and lose despite almost always being positive. Sumail took CK mid and when our jakiro said he's not a great mid sumail paused. He made us stay paused for 2 to 4 business days by promising to make us EG fill-ins if universe takes paternity leave after impregnating aui_2000. He then posted a link to a news article about a man killed by a letter-bomb while in a paused game of Defense of the Legends of the Storm of Newerth 2 (i think it was cnn). He then said nothing but "New Meta fagots" for the next 20 minutes because he was able to get brown boots 30 seconds earlier with jakiro's gold. He had arcane boots and dagon 2 at 40 minutes, but somehow we had all our towers. Sumail got first blood at 52 minutes when he Dagoned the afk bounty hunter and told us to report everyone on their team and help him push. I accidentally took the last hit on the tower and sumail went off for 10 minutes in all chat about how he would rape and kill my entire family in detail. He fed 6 times since he was in the middle of the lane but kept coming back to them to flame and then dying. I didn't say anything all game but i spoke up and called him "desert trash". Immediately both teams turned on me, spewing  personal and racial  insults for every race just to make sure i got offended. Our jungler pudge broadcast my location for the rest of the game and kept cliffing me. We won at 1 hour 42 minutes and that's how i got 18 games of low priority. Protip: don't insult a flaming pakistani

I run a 6-700 member guild full of angry foreigners this way. I originally did it to be an ass but now there are open guild parties for that guild literally 24/7, it's ridiculous. I refuse to play with them because everyone in the guild has ruined a game in some way lol.

I also don't invite people just because they've had a bad game, you have to go above and beyond in your shit to get an invite lol. Usually it boils down to a combination of feeding all game and flaming everyone else. It's a very toxic guild, the chat is very angry seeming most of the time. It's hard to tell because it's mostly not in English lol.

For posterity, my guild is named "You're God Awful at Dota" and the tag is iFed
